title: Coffeehouses Of Isfahan with Farshid Emami
itunes:author: Zirrar
itunes:summary: Join me and the renowned Persian historian Farshid Emami, as we discuss the importance of coffee to Persian royal society, common culture and its impact on architecture in Isfahan.
